wordGroup: company tenet 公司宗旨；企业宗旨

sentences.en: This view has become the tenet of the modern linguistic approach to grammatical analysis.
sentences.cn: 这一观点已成为现代语言学语法分析的原则。

sentences.en: My creed is love and you are its only tenet—you have ravished me away by a power I cannot resist.
sentences.cn: 我的信仰是爱，而你就是它唯一的信条——你用一种我无法抗拒的力量把我夺去了。

sentences.en: The only moral tenet governing the conduct of business in the shop was that the goods should be genuine and the price fair.
sentences.cn: 货真价实，是商店唯一的道德。
